revised_title: Development of a New Instrument for Measuring Low Order Magnetic Susceptibilities
tldr: The authors develop a new instrument, a modification of the Curie balance, to measure the magnetic susceptibilities of low order in rock specimens. The instrument uses an electromagnet, a magnetic circuit with a silicon alloy core, and a phosphor-bronze strip for greater sensitivity. The authors describe the apparatus, its operation, and preliminary experiments, and discuss the advantages of the new method over previous techniques.
